Title: Prohibits line-item appropriations for organizations engaged in political activities
Summary: Prohibits line-item appropriations, grants, or disbursements from lump sum appropriations to be directed to organizations engaged in political activities.
LawCode: Add ยง53-e, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to prohibiting line-item appropriations for organizations engaged in political activities
